me puja bhumiya ee aya diwi himiyen raka ganima pilibandawa owunta sthuthi wiya yuthuyi.me thiriyaya girihadu saya widuli wyapruthiyata amatharawa mahinda chinthanaya yatathe thrikunamalaya disthrikkaye nawa widuli wyapruthi 90 k pasugiya masa 6 athulatha kriyathmaka karanu labuwa.mewa siduwune widulibala amathi patali champika ranawaka mahathage meheyawima mathayi.ee sandaha rupiyal laksha 3300 k waya kara thibena bawa widuli bala mandalaye sabhapathi mahacharya wimaladharma abewikrama mahatha apa samanga pawasuwa.mita amatharawa gi්rad upa pola kipayak idikara ha adhi sara widuli marga da kilomitar gananawak da adinu labuwa.idiriyata warshikawa sama poson pohoya dinayakama girigadu saya asala aaloka pujawak pawathwimata katayuthu karana bawa widuli bala amathyanshaye niladharin pawasanawa.
